sentences.sentence: Even the pirates were awed, and Tootles cried out hysterically, "I am going to do what my mother hopes."
sentences.translation: 连海盗们心生敬畏，图托斯歇斯底里地叫道：“我要去做我母亲希望我做的事。”

sentences.sentence: As the last notes of the hymn died away, the widow ran to the coffin, cast herself upon it and sobbed hysterically.
sentences.translation: 当赞美诗的最后几个音符渐渐消失时，寡妇跑到棺材前，扑在上面，歇斯底里地抽泣起来。
“伯纳德？”她的嗓门歇斯底里地升高了。
